data.oai_dc:dc: The dataset includes occurrence data of invasive and potentially invasive nonnative plant species. The datasets are being collected since 2010, mostly in the German federal state Saxony-Anhalt, but also in other federal states of Germany and in Europe. Collectors are the staff of the Coordination Centre for alien invasive plant species (KORINA), employees of public authorities, scientists, students and citizens.|16,506 occurrences
